mapper.select: SELECT pe_medication_plans.medication_plans_id, pe_medication_plans.drug_name, sys_user.nick_name, pe_medication_plans.dosage, pe_medication_plans.frequency, pe_medication_plans.is_active, pe_medication_plans.remark, pe_medication_plans.user_id FROM pe_medication_plans INNER JOIN sys_user ON pe_medication_plans.user_id = sys_user.user_id WHERE sys_user.user_id = #{userId} AND pe_medication_plans.del_flag != '2'

SELECT pe_medication_record.remark, pe_medication_record.time, pe_medication_record.create_by, pe_medication_record.create_time, pe_medication_record.medication_record_id FROM pe_medication_record WHERE pe_medication_record.medication_plans_id = #{medicationPlansId} AND pe_medication_record.del_flag != '2'
